about_the_game:
Epic Combat

Engage in strategic battles with hundreds of ships using simple commands and tactical deployments. Carefully plan your attacks to preserve your fleet’s strength as you prepare for the ultimate confrontation against the enemy Leviathan.

Fleet Management

Take control of your fleet and unlock its full potential by liberating planets. With each victory, you’ll gain a chance to acquire new ship blueprints or tech upgrades, allowing you to customize your fleet to overcome increasingly difficult enemies.

Tech Upgrades

Transform your fleet with powerful tech upgrades that dramatically enhance your ships’ capabilities. Discover new tools and enhancements to outmaneuver and outgun your enemies.

Dynamic Maps

Explore a galaxy that evolves with every run. Each playthrough introduces unique galaxies filled with diverse challenges, opportunities, and dangers.

Roguelite Progression

Each time you liberate a galaxy, you unlock higher tiers of difficulty and earn a new ship to permanently add to your collection. Future games start with these ships in your fleet. The higher the tier of the galaxy you liberate, the more powerful the ship you receive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5 or equivalent (DirectX 10/OpenGL 3.3+)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated graphics should work, but a dedicated GPU is recommended for smoother performance.

short_description: Command a fleet of customizable ships in this roguelite strategy autobattler. Liberate planets to unlock new ships and powerful upgrades. Engage in strategic battles, manage your fleet, and face escalating challenges as you fight to free the universe through increasingly difficult galaxies.
